name: Spirit Serenade - Download
description:
Spirit Serenade is a wave defense game, where you, the knight, stave off hordes of evil beings in order to protect the last true power on the eternal plane AKA 'The Core'. Use your masterful control of the blade to take down the evil false lords and feed their power to The Core. As The Core grows in power so do you, as The Core grows it will imbue you with powerful buffs that will aid in your conquest of the false lords.

Can you defeat all of the false lords and rise to power on the eternal plane?

If you enjoyed this short project, feel free check us out on Twitter @Exceedgame for live updates on our other project Exceed Academy, an online PVP battle arena game.
